oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Framed photograph of young African American man leaning on Civil War cannon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Judging from the man's dress and apparent age, this picture was taken well after the Civil War, possibly in the early 20th century. Too young to be a veteran, he appears to be standing against a cannon in a Civil War battlefield park. The cannon appears to be a 12 lb. Napoleon.
